name: solid-rock

effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it. This ability functions identically to filter.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it. This ability functions identically to filter.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it. This ability functions identically to filter.

short_effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
